name: <<Future Rewind<<
description:
Take control of Rick Rewind, top time-agent at The Bureau of Temporal Corrections. Rick has been thrown into chaos after a routine mission went wrong, ripping him into two dimensions of time. 

Unfortunately for Rick, the Bureau would rather wipe him from time entirely and has dispatched a number of time-agents to solve the problem. You must guide Rick's future self safely back to his past self in order to sync his time streams and save him from the time travelling nightmare he finds himself in. 

Control Rick with WASD
